testcase.name: statisticsEndpointsReturnAggregations

error.message: PreparedStatementCallback; bad SQL grammar [SELECT "roles"."ID" AS "ID", "roles"."NAME" AS "NAME" FROM "roles" WHERE "roles"."NAME" = ?]
